meanings.definition: A silver coin and monetary unit of Panama, equal to 100 centesimos.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny balboa in my pocket.
meanings.sent2: The vendor accepted payment in balboas.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a balboa from behind my ear!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a balboa, rare and precious.
meanings.sent5: The balboa gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of wealth.

meanings.definition: A seaport in Panama at the Pacific terminus of the Panama Canal.
meanings.sent1: We arrived at Balboa after a long journey.
meanings.sent2: Ships from around the world dock at Balboa.
meanings.sent3: The pirates decided to make Balboa their new hideout.
meanings.sent4: Balboa stood like a guardian at the entrance to the canal.
meanings.sent5: The lights of Balboa twinkled in the night, guiding ships home.
